column3:
この地方を巡って
英傑ダルケルの逸話を聞いているうちに…
師匠の未完の詩とは別に
私も彼を表現してみたくなりました
そこでダルケルが操ったという
この神獣 ヴァ・ルーダニアの元で…
column4:
Ah! Wandering around here and listening
to anecdotes aboutChampion Daruk
has truly invigorated me.
In fact, it has inspired me to honor
him in my own way, separate from
my teacher'sunfinished song.
That is why I felt inclined to roost here,
near theDivine Beast Vah Rudania,
whichDaruk himself mastered.

column3:
こんな詩を作ってみました
ありし日の英傑ダルケルの姿を描く詩…
column4:
I've written a song...to try and capture
the essence ofChampion Daruk...

column3:
♪これは"ルーダニアを繰りし者が
未だ英傑と呼ばれる前の物語
その名はダルケル…"ゴロンの猛者
山訪れし姫と"歩み語らん…
column4:
♪RecallRudania'sChampion of flame,
before his fated momentfinally came.♪

♪This is the tale"of GreatDaruk's task,
and the princesswho came to ask.♪

column3:
…英傑になる人にも
恐れるものはあったんですね
column4:
Hmm... I suppose even Champions are
not immune to fear.

column3:
いかがでしたか？
英傑ダルケルの詩
彼の人間味を詩に出来たことで
師匠に一歩近づけたような気がします
column4:
So? What do you think of
Champion Daruk's Song?

By writing a song that celebrates the
softer side of Champion Daruk, I feel
closer than ever to my dear teacher.
